a:5:{s:1:"d";a:29:{i:0;O:8:"stdClass":15:{s:11:"category_id";s:2:"10";s:13:"category_type";s:6:"topics";s:9:"parent_id";s:1:"0";s:3:"uri";s:24:"agricultural-development";s:13:"category_name";s:24:"Agricultural Development";s:11:"description";s:273:"<p>ERIA&#039;s research on agricultural development attempts to address the growing opportunities for&nbsp;agricultural development and trade arising from a robustly growing East Asia, as well as the political and social imperative of food security in the region.&nbsp;</p>";s:13:"external_link";s:1:"0";s:10:"image_name";s:43:"/uploads/topics/agriculture_not-resized.jpg";s:9:"published";s:1:"1";s:8:"order_id";s:3:"100";s:13:"meta_keywords";s:46:"agriculture, development, trade, food security";s:16:"meta_description";s:125:"ERIA's research on agricultural development address growing opportunities for development and trade, as well as food security";s:13:"modified_date";s:19:"2017-12-06 12:13:10";s:11:"modified_by";s:1:"9";s:7:"old_url";N;}i:1;O:8:"stdClass":15:{s:11:"category_id";s:2:"11";s:13:"category_type";s:6:"topics";s:9:"parent_id";s:1:"0";s:3:"uri";s:5:"asean";s:13:"category_name";s:5:"ASEAN";s:11:"description";s:501:"<p>The story of ASEAN is one of building up from managing intra-regional (ASEAN) disputes to facilitating the management of pan-regional (East Asia) disputes; from economic cooperation to economic integration, and from nation building to regional community (ASEAN) building. ERIA works with the ASEAN Chair in producing research projects that serve the Chair&#039;s objectives in the one-year chairmanship period, while working to secure the long term goal of deepening regional integration.&nbsp;</p>";s:13:"external_link";s:1:"0";s:10:"image_name";s:30:"/uploads/topics/asean-flag.jpg";s:9:"published";s:1:"1";s:8:"order_id";s:3:"200";s:13:"meta_keywords";s:74:"ASEAN, research, economic integration, nation building, community building";s:16:"meta_description";s:158:"ERIA works with ASEAN Chair on research projects that serve the Chair's objectives in the one-year period, while aiming towards deepening regional integration";s:13:"modified_date";s:19:"2017-11-29 17:30:40";s:11:"modified_by";s:1:"4";s:7:"old_url";N;}i:2;O:8:"stdClass":15:{s:11:"category_id";s:3:"213";s:13:"category_type";s:6:"topics";s:9:"parent_id";s:1:"0";s:3:"uri";s:18:"call-for-proposals";s:13:"category_name";s:18:"Call for Proposals";s:11:"description";s:211:"<p>ERIA invites the submission of research proposals to join its research projects across sectors. ERIA examines the effect of education on capacity building in various ways, such as development capacity, innovation capability, and managerial efficiency. ERIA&rsquo;s studies also delve into the effects of higher education, learning centres, and technology transfers, among others.</p>";s:13:"external_link";s:1:"0";s:10:"image_name";s:39:"/uploads/topics/education_245320060.jpg";s:9:"published";s:1:"1";s:8:"order_id";s:3:"500";s:13:"meta_keywords";s:135:"education, development capacity, innovation capability, managerial efficiency, higher education, learning centres, technology transfers";s:16:"meta_description";s:63:"ERIA studies education and its spillover effects on development";s:13:"modified_date";s:19:"2018-03-15 09:39:49";s:11:"modified_by";s:1:"4";s:7:"old_url";N;}i:10;O:8:"stdClass":15:{s:11:"category_id";s:2:"15";s:13:"category_type";s:6:"topics";s:9:"parent_id";s:1:"0";s:3:"uri";s:6:"energy";s:13:"category_name";s:6:"Energy";s:11:"description";s:1014:"<p>According to ERIA&rsquo;s research, the amount of energy consumption in this region will practically double in 2040. Therefore, conventional energy may still be used by most ASEAN and East Asian countries to satisfy the growing energy demand, with efforts to reduce the environmental impact and to gradually increase the use of renewable energy. ERIA produces annual research on&nbsp;energy outlook and energy saving potential in East Asia to look at the balance of energy best-mix based on each country&rsquo;s policy and targets, as well as to predict the pattern of future energy consumption.</p><p>Some of ERIA&#039;s studies on renewable and clean energy includes projects on biomass energy utilisation, nuclear energy safety and efficiency, energy saving, energy security, eco town, low carbon emission, and power generation. Furthermore, ERIA have also contribute suggestions on energy policy, energy market integration, emission regulation, as well as country specific energy consumption statistics.</p>";s:13:"external_link";s:1:"0";s:10:"image_name";s:36:"/uploads/topics/energy_112485596.jpg";s:9:"published";s:1:"1";s:8:"order_id";s:3:"600";s:13:"meta_keywords";s:84:"conventional energy, renewable energy, energy outlook, energy mix, energy statistics";s:16:"meta_description";s:84:"ERIA studies conventional and renewable energy, energy outlook and energy statistics";s:13:"modified_date";s:19:"2018-01-29 17:19:07";s:11:"modified_by";s:1:"4";s:7:"old_url";N;}i:11;O:8:"stdClass":15:{s:11:"category_id";s:2:"16";s:13:"category_type";s:6:"topics";s:9:"parent_id";s:1:"0";s:3:"uri";s:30:"environment-and-climate-change";s:13:"category_name";s:30:"Environment and Climate Change";s:11:"description";s:488:"<p>Climate change is an immense global challenge. ERIA endeavours to help the environment through&nbsp;its research on renewable energy, power infrastructure, carbon footprint, biodiversity conservation, and food supply chain. In addition, ERIA conducts studies on circular economy, sustainability assessment, energy policy suggestions, sustainable development policy advices, energy market integration propositions, inclusive green growth model, new development model, and many more.</p>";s:13:"external_link";s:1:"0";s:10:"image_name";s:41:"/uploads/topics/environment_392220364.jpg";s:9:"published";s:1:"1";s:8:"order_id";s:3:"700";s:13:"meta_keywords";s:115:"renewable energy, power infrastructure, biodiversity conservation, circular economy, green growth, carbon footprint";s:16:"meta_description";s:157:"ERIA endeavours to help the environment through research on renewable energy, power infrastructure, biodiversity conservation, circular economy, green growth";s:13:"modified_date";s:19:"2018-03-14 09:43:14";s:11:"modified_by";s:1:"4";s:7:"old_url";N;}i:12;O:8:"stdClass":15:{s:11:"category_id";s:2:"17";s:13:"category_type";s:6:"topics";s:9:"parent_id";s:1:"0";s:3:"uri";s:24:"finance-and-macroeconomy";s:13:"category_name";s:24:"Finance and Macroeconomy";s:11:"description";s:563:"<p>ERIA looks into issues related to macroeconomic policies including fiscal policies, monetary policies, international economic integrations, free&nbsp;trade agreements, trade barriers, trade facilitation, and international investment protection. Additionally, ERIA also investigate impacts of globalisation, economic shocks, financial crises, and foreign output shocks, among many others. Furthermore, ERIA also conducts various research on social security system, country risk, regional cooperation, market integrations, exports and imports, and many more.</p>";s:13:"external_link";s:1:"0";s:10:"image_name";s:37:"/uploads/topics/finance_339441968.jpg";s:9:"published";s:1:"1";s:8:"order_id";s:3:"800";s:13:"meta_keywords";s:158:"fiscal and monetary policies, international economic integrations, free trade agreements, trade barriers and facilitation, international investment protection";s:16:"meta_description";s:94:"ERIA looks into issues related to macroeconomic policies, trade, investment, and globalisation";s:13:"modified_date";s:19:"2018-03-14 09:40:24";s:11:"modified_by";s:1:"4";s:7:"old_url";N;}i:13;O:8:"stdClass":15:{s:11:"category_id";s:3:"224";s:13:"category_type";s:6:"topics";s:9:"parent_id";s:1:"0";s:3:"uri";s:37:"global-governance-and-multilateralism";s:13:"category_name";s:37:"Global Governance and Multilateralism";s:11:"description";s:0:"";s:13:"external_link";s:1:"0";s:10:"image_name";s:36:"/uploads/topics/istock-537851711.jpg";s:9:"published";s:1:"1";s:8:"order_id";s:3:"850";s:13:"meta_keywords";s:0:"";s:16:"meta_description";s:0:"";s:13:"modified_date";s:19:"2018-10-02 14:57:23";s:11:"modified_by";s:1:"4";s:7:"old_url";N;}i:14;O:8:"stdClass":15:{s:11:"category_id";s:3:"233";s:13:"category_type";s:6:"topics";s:9:"parent_id";s:1:"0";s:3:"uri";s:29:"healthcare-and-ageing-society";s:13:"category_name";s:29:"Healthcare and Ageing Society";s:11:"description";s:423:"<p>Asia is facing a massive demographic shift. By 2050, the number of people in Asia who are aged 65 or older is expected to grow to 937 million people&mdash;more than double today&#039;s number. ERIA is conducting various projects related to long-term care and ageing society in a bid to support policymaking decisions to overcome the challenges of the ageing population boom in ASEAN and East Asia.&nbsp;</p><p>&nbsp;</p>";s:13:"external_link";s:1:"0";s:10:"image_name";s:45:"/uploads/topics/istock-1158195576_300x200.jpg";s:9:"published";s:1:"1";s:8:"order_id";s:3:"860";s:13:"meta_keywords";s:80:"ageing society, long-term care, healthcare, demographic shift, ageing population";s:16:"meta_description";s:158:"ERIA conducts projects related to long-term care and ageing society to support policymaking decisions to overcome the challenges of the ageing population boom";s:13:"modified_date";s:19:"2019-10-17 11:29:47";s:11:"modified_by";s:1:"4";s:7:"old_url";N;}i:15;O:8:"stdClass":15:{s:11:"category_id";s:3:"245";s:13:"category_type";s:6:"topics";s:9:"parent_id";s:1:"0";s:3:"uri";s:5:"india";s:13:"category_name";s:5:"India";s:11:"description";s:602:"<p>India is a founding member of the East Asia Summit and an active member of ERIA&rsquo;s research network in the region. India offers a sizeable market and demographic dividend to investors and enjoys a leading share in global trade in services. India influences and shapes the regional connectivity in the Indo-Pacific, across all the pillars - economic, security, and social-cultural. ASEAN-India connectivity is central to all connectivity plans in the region. ERIA works closely with the government and research networks in India on themes of economic integration and sustainable development.</p>";s:13:"external_link";s:1:"0";s:10:"image_name";s:45:"/uploads/topics/istock-1209847110_300x200.jpg";s:9:"published";s:1:"1";s:8:"order_id";s:3:"880";s:13:"meta_keywords";s:0:"";s:16:"meta_description";s:0:"";s:13:"modified_date";s:19:"2020-09-17 17:25:49";s:11:"modified_by";s:1:"4";s:7:"old_url";N;}i:16;O:8:"stdClass":15:{s:11:"category_id";s:2:"18";s:13:"category_type";s:6:"topics";s:9:"parent_id";s:1:"0";s:3:"uri";s:26:"industry-and-manufacturing";s:13:"category_name";s:26:"Industry and Manufacturing";s:11:"description";s:486:"<p>ERIA examines various parts of industry and manufacturing starting from small and medium enterprises to multinational corporations and from intra-industry to international inter-industry connection. By using case studies from various industries in many countries, the researchers analyse industrial development and transformation, public-private partnership, production and logistic networks, technology transfer and spillover, industry sustainability, and industry integrations.</p>";s:13:"external_link";s:1:"0";s:10:"image_name";s:38:"/uploads/topics/industry_115846333.jpg";s:9:"published";s:1:"1";s:8:"order_id";s:3:"900";s:13:"meta_keywords";s:154:"industrial development and transformation, public-private partnership, production and logistic networks, technology transfer and spillover, sustainability";s:16:"meta_description";s:157:"ERIA examines various parts of industry and manufacturing starting from small and medium enterprises to multinational corporations, intra- and inter-industry";s:13:"modified_date";s:19:"2018-03-14 09:46:01";s:11:"modified_by";s:1:"4";s:7:"old_url";N;}i:17;O:8:"stdClass":15:{s:11:"category_id";s:2:"19";s:13:"category_type";s:6:"topics";s:9:"parent_id";s:1:"0";s:3:"uri";s:14:"infrastructure";s:13:"category_name";s:14:"Infrastructure";s:11:"description";s:613:"<p>Infrastructure is&nbsp;crucial for development. ERIA examine ways to enhance various facets of infrastructure which include, but not limited to, logistic and production networks, energy efficiency, and information security. Furthermore, ERIA also looks into border area development, power sector, transport sector, power grid interconnection, smart community development, and many more. Among various research and analytical methods, geographical simulation analysis is one of the new and popular tools for this topic especially in researching advices for infrastructure development framework or blueprint.</p>";s:13:"external_link";s:1:"0";s:10:"image_name";s:44:"/uploads/topics/infrastructure_141973483.jpg";s:9:"published";s:1:"1";s:8:"order_id";s:4:"1000";s:13:"meta_keywords";s:158:"logistic and production networks, energy efficiency, information security, border area development, power sector, transport sector, power grid interconnection";s:16:"meta_description";s:147:"ERIA examine ways to enhance various facets of infrastructure such as logistic and production networks, energy efficiency, and information security";s:13:"modified_date";s:19:"2018-03-14 09:51:04";s:11:"modified_by";s:1:"4";s:7:"old_url";N;}i:18;O:8:"stdClass":15:{s:11:"category_id";s:2:"20";s:13:"category_type";s:6:"topics";s:9:"parent_id";s:1:"0";s:3:"uri";s:25:"innovation-and-technology";s:13:"category_name";s:25:"Innovation and Technology";s:11:"description";s:757:"<p>Innovation is an inseparable part of development that goes hand in hand with technology. ERIA investigates&nbsp;the impact of innovation and technology in development, such as e-commerce, digital marketplace, information and communication technology advancements, renewable energy, cyber security, and interactive learning, among others. Furthermore, ERIA&#039;s researchers look into production networks, innovation capability, information infrastructure, logistic networks, technological capability, distribution networks, and other topics around innovation and technology. Additionally, ERIA examines the externalities like spillover and transfers of technology that are not always included in the impact calculations of innovation and technology.</p>";s:13:"external_link";s:1:"0";s:10:"image_name";s:40:"/uploads/topics/innovation_310719236.jpg";s:9:"published";s:1:"1";s:8:"order_id";s:4:"1100";s:13:"meta_keywords";s:146:"e-commerce, digital marketplace, information and communication technology advancements, renewable energy, cyber security, and interactive learning";s:16:"meta_description";s:131:"ERIA investigates the impact of innovation and technology in development, such as e-commerce, digital marketplace, ICT advancements";s:13:"modified_date";s:19:"2018-03-14 10:01:27";s:11:"modified_by";s:1:"4";s:7:"old_url";N;}i:19;O:8:"stdClass":15:{s:11:"category_id";s:2:"21";s:13:"category_type";s:6:"topics";s:9:"parent_id";s:1:"0";s:3:"uri";s:10:"investment";s:13:"category_name";s:10:"Investment";s:11:"description";s:530:"<p>Investment is a necessity for economic development whether it is foreign direct investment (FDI),&nbsp;private investment, or other kinds of investments. ERIA looks into issues related to investments such as&nbsp;economic impact and their evaluation, market entry barriers, free trade agreements, effective investment, country risk, FDI restrictiveness, international investment agreements, and more. The various&nbsp;studies&nbsp;used&nbsp;a variation of methods such as sectoral analysis and principal component analysis.</p>";s:13:"external_link";s:1:"0";s:10:"image_name";s:40:"/uploads/topics/investment_149072456.jpg";s:9:"published";s:1:"1";s:8:"order_id";s:4:"1200";s:13:"meta_keywords";s:126:"economic impact and their evaluation, market entry barriers, FTA, FDI, effective investment, country risk, FDI restrictiveness";s:16:"meta_description";s:84:"ERIA looks into issues related to foreign direct investments and private investments";s:13:"modified_date";s:19:"2018-03-14 10:05:12";s:11:"modified_by";s:1:"4";s:7:"old_url";N;}i:20;O:8:"stdClass":15:{s:11:"category_id";s:2:"22";s:13:"category_type";s:6:"topics";s:9:"parent_id";s:1:"0";s:3:"uri";s:20:"labour-and-migration";s:13:"category_name";s:20:"Labour and Migration";s:11:"description";s:442:"<p>Labour and migration have always been an important topic of research and discussions. ERIA dives deep into it through&nbsp;a range of sub-topics surrounding labour and migration, such as labour mobility, employment, rural development, social welfare, labour adjustment management, migrant networks, and social protections. Furthermore, ERIA also works on problems related to labour and migration such as gender wage gap and inequality.</p>";s:13:"external_link";s:1:"0";s:10:"image_name";s:49:"/uploads/topics/labour-_-migration-_413496160.jpg";s:9:"published";s:1:"1";s:8:"order_id";s:4:"1300";s:13:"meta_keywords";s:134:"labour mobility, employment, rural development, social welfare, labour adjustment management, migrant networks, and social protections";s:16:"meta_description";s:132:"ERIA studies issues surrounding labour and migration, like mobility, employment, rural development, social welfare, migrant networks";s:13:"modified_date";s:19:"2018-03-14 10:11:27";s:11:"modified_by";s:1:"4";s:7:"old_url";N;}i:21;O:8:"stdClass":15:{s:11:"category_id";s:2:"23";s:13:"category_type";s:6:"topics";s:9:"parent_id";s:1:"0";s:3:"uri";s:41:"poverty-and-sustainable-development-goals";s:13:"category_name";s:41:"Poverty and Sustainable Development Goals";s:11:"description";s:498:"<p>Poverty is one of the most persistent problems in the&nbsp;world, which countries try to alleviate&nbsp;while setting sustainable development goals to achieve a better future for mankind as a whole. In an effort to promote sustainable development goals and diminish poverty, ERIA&nbsp;conducts various research&nbsp;on income distributions, sustainable development policies, conditional cash transfers, people-centred economic growth, rural development, and socio-cultural community framing.</p>";s:13:"external_link";s:1:"0";s:10:"image_name";s:37:"/uploads/topics/poverty_381395215.jpg";s:9:"published";s:1:"1";s:8:"order_id";s:4:"1400";s:13:"meta_keywords";s:158:"income distributions, sustainable development policies, conditional cash transfers, people-centred growth, rural development, socio-cultural community framing";s:16:"meta_description";s:159:"ERIA conducts research on income distributions, sustainable development policies, conditional cash transfers, people-centred economic growth, rural development";s:13:"modified_date";s:19:"2018-03-14 10:25:47";s:11:"modified_by";s:1:"4";s:7:"old_url";N;}i:22;O:8:"stdClass":15:{s:11:"category_id";s:2:"24";s:13:"category_type";s:6:"topics";s:9:"parent_id";s:1:"0";s:3:"uri";s:25:"regulation-and-governance";s:13:"category_name";s:25:"Regulation and Governance";s:11:"description";s:595:"<p>As an international organisation that&nbsp;works with various governmental bodies and organisations, ERIA&nbsp;engages in research to help governments improve on their regulation and governance. The studies range&nbsp;from sustainable development policies, industrial corridor, global production network, deregulations of specific cases, regulatory restrictions in some services,&nbsp;and effects of specific policies. ERIA also leads research in financial integration, fiscal policy, monetary policy, regulatory coherence, development strategies, regional cooperation, and growth policy.</p>";s:13:"external_link";s:1:"0";s:10:"image_name";s:51:"/uploads/topics/regulation-governance_423038152.jpg";s:9:"published";s:1:"1";s:8:"order_id";s:4:"1500";s:13:"meta_keywords";s:155:"sustainable development policies, industrial corridor, global production network, deregulations of specific cases, regulatory restrictions in some services";s:16:"meta_description";s:87:"ERIA engages in research to help governments improve on their regulation and governance";s:13:"modified_date";s:19:"2018-03-14 10:32:08";s:11:"modified_by";s:1:"4";s:7:"old_url";N;}i:23;O:8:"stdClass":15:{s:11:"category_id";s:2:"25";s:13:"category_type";s:6:"topics";s:9:"parent_id";s:1:"0";s:3:"uri";s:8:"services";s:13:"category_name";s:8:"Services";s:11:"description";s:425:"<p>ASEAN&nbsp;is well on its way to become&nbsp;a global services hub, especially after the ASEAN Economic Community comes into effect in 2015. ERIA contributes to helping ASEAN Member States improve their services industry through research on health services, barriers to trade within different services, financial services, trade facilitation, regulatory restrictions in logistic services, and strategic transport plan.</p>";s:13:"external_link";s:1:"0";s:10:"image_name";s:37:"/uploads/topics/services_91471973.jpg";s:9:"published";s:1:"1";s:8:"order_id";s:4:"1600";s:13:"meta_keywords";s:127:"health services, financial services, trade facilitation, regulatory restrictions in logistic services, strategic transport plan";s:16:"meta_description";s:145:"ERIA contributes to helping ASEAN Member States improve their services industry through research on health, financial, trade, and transportation.";s:13:"modified_date";s:19:"2018-03-14 10:40:29";s:11:"modified_by";s:1:"4";s:7:"old_url";N;}i:24;O:8:"stdClass":15:{s:11:"category_id";s:2:"26";s:13:"category_type";s:6:"topics";s:9:"parent_id";s:1:"0";s:3:"uri";s:4:"smes";s:13:"category_name";s:4:"SMEs";s:11:"description";s:443:"<p>Small- and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs) is a big part of the economy in many Asian countries. ERIA examines factors that could help improve SMEs, such as effective knowledge sources, productivity nexus, innovation constraints and determinants for SMEs, and&nbsp; access to finance. ERIA also leads research around government policies and regulatory support for SMEs like SME trade policy, SME investment policy, and competition laws.</p>";s:13:"external_link";s:1:"0";s:10:"image_name";s:33:"/uploads/topics/sme_204645943.jpg";s:9:"published";s:1:"1";s:8:"order_id";s:4:"1700";s:13:"meta_keywords";s:158:"Small and medium-sized enterprises, SMEs, effective knowledge sources, productivity nexus, innovation constraints and determinants for SMEs, access to finance";s:16:"meta_description";s:160:"ERIA examines factors to improve SMEs, like effective knowledge sources, productivity nexus, innovation constraints and determinants for SMEs, access to finance";s:13:"modified_date";s:19:"2018-03-14 10:43:46";s:11:"modified_by";s:1:"4";s:7:"old_url";N;}i:25;O:8:"stdClass":15:{s:11:"category_id";s:2:"27";s:13:"category_type";s:6:"topics";s:9:"parent_id";s:1:"0";s:3:"uri";s:17:"social-protection";s:13:"category_name";s:17:"Social Protection";s:11:"description";s:312:"<p>Social protection is one of the most important commitments undertaken by governments. ERIA works to assist ASEAN and East Asia countries on social protection through research on related topics such as social security system, food security, fiscal sustainability, risk management, insurance, and many more.</p>";s:13:"external_link";s:1:"0";s:10:"image_name";s:35:"/uploads/topics/social_33110404.jpg";s:9:"published";s:1:"1";s:8:"order_id";s:4:"1800";s:13:"meta_keywords";s:88:"social security system, food security, fiscal sustainability, risk management, insurance";s:16:"meta_description";s:148:"ERIA lead research on social protection related topics like social security system, food security, fiscal sustainability, risk management, insurance";s:13:"modified_date";s:19:"2018-03-14 10:49:13";s:11:"modified_by";s:1:"4";s:7:"old_url";N;}i:26;O:8:"stdClass":15:{s:11:"category_id";s:2:"29";s:13:"category_type";s:6:"topics";s:9:"parent_id";s:1:"0";s:3:"uri";s:23:"state-owned-enterprises";s:13:"category_name";s:23:"State-Owned Enterprises";s:11:"description";s:483:"<p>There are a lot of state-owned enterprises throughout various industries in Asia. However, the fact that these enterprises are state-owned translates into several issues. ERIA examines these problems and provide policy recommendations for issues related to barriers in Foreign Direct Investment and private investment, neutralising the advantages of state-owned enterprises, competition law enforcement, public-private partnership, and transparent regional competition policy.</p>";s:13:"external_link";s:1:"0";s:10:"image_name";s:39:"/uploads/topics/state-own_420165337.jpg";s:9:"published";s:1:"1";s:8:"order_id";s:4:"2000";s:13:"meta_keywords";s:150:"barriers in to State-Owned Enterprises and provide policy recommendations";s:13:"modified_date";s:19:"2018-03-14 09:32:21";s:11:"modified_by";s:1:"4";s:7:"old_url";N;}i:27;O:8:"stdClass":15:{s:11:"category_id";s:2:"28";s:13:"category_type";s:6:"topics";s:9:"parent_id";s:1:"0";s:3:"uri";s:5:"trade";s:13:"category_name";s:5:"Trade";s:11:"description";s:346:"<p>ERIA examines various aspects of trade starting from&nbsp;issues that can affect&nbsp;trade such as exchange rate volatility, trade facilitations, trade agreements, mega free trade agreements like the Regional Comprehensive Economic Partnership agreement (RCEP), trade liberalisation, tariffs and non-tariffs measures, and many more.&nbsp;</p>";s:13:"external_link";s:1:"0";s:10:"image_name";s:35:"/uploads/topics/trade_401078842.jpg";s:9:"published";s:1:"1";s:8:"order_id";s:4:"1900";s:13:"meta_keywords";s:118:"trade issues that can affect trade and the various spillover effects of trade";s:13:"modified_date";s:19:"2018-03-14 Development";s:11:"description";s:424:"<p>Many ASEAN and East Asian countries have been experiencing rapid urban development where significant number of their population resides. Therefore, ERIA works on various topic within and surrounding urban development like public transportation, health, socio-cultural community, low-carbon smart cities, green growth model, rural development, smart community development, and people-centred inclusive economic growth.</p>";s:13:"external_link";s:1:"0";s:10:"image_name";s:48:"/uploads/topics/urban-development-_109788791.jpg";s:9:"published";s:1:"1";s:8:"order_id";s:4:"2100";s:13:"meta_keywords";s:148:"public transportation, health, socio-cultural community, low-carbon smart cities, green growth model, rural development, smart community development";s:16:"meta_description";s:68:"ERIA works on various topic within and surrounding urban development";s:13:"modified_date";s:19:"2018-03-14 09:22:45";s:11:"modified_by";s:1:"4";s:7:"old_url";N;}}s:1:"g";a:0:{}s:1:"e";O:8:"DateTime":3:{s:4:"date";s:26:"2022-10-28 12:11:06.996145";s:13:"timezone_type";i:3;s:8:"timezone";s:13:"Europe/Berlin";}s:1:"m";N;s:1:"c";N;}
